column3: Setup: Run the autoassign testdrive at /testdrive/autoassign if you have not already done so
Using the details under `map_by_account` in the testdrive setup, log in using the `admin_username` and `admin_password`

column4: On the left navigation, there is a menu item with an alert triangle icon

column3:
Click on the menu item with the alert triangle icon

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//admin/alerts

column4: You are taken to the Admin Alerts page
The "new" alert filter is already selected
There is an alert from "Autoassign test" with a recent date
A pop-up tells you the operation was successful and to reload the page

column3: Clear the "new" filter using the X next to the filter name

column4: All alerts are now visible, including the one you just set to "In Progress" (there may only be this one alert in the test system)
The alert has only one option "Mark Closed"
The alert has an audit trail showing that it was set to "In Progress" by the user
A pop-up tells you the operation was successful and to reload the page
The alert is still visible, but now has a status of "Closed"
There are no buttons available on the alert.
The alert has an audit trail showing that it was marked closed by the user
